did.abstract: Personal and business correspondence of Harvey R. and Henry Beach, Milford, Connecticut carriage manufacturers, concerning the collection of claims at New Orleans, Louisiana; conditions of the carriage business; and settlement of an estate.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.p: Harvey Beach letters, 1861-1869, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.p: This finding aid was derived from a MARC record using a crosswalk defined in marc2ead_section.xsl. The finding aid was generated as part of a larger project to digitize several thousand small collections housed in Section A, January 2017.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Connecticut resident (New Haven County) and carriage manufacturer.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Personal and business correspondence of Harvey R. and Henry Beach, Milford, Connecticut carriage manufacturers, concerning the collection of claims at New Orleans, Louisiana; conditions of the carriage business; and settlement of an estate.
